body_html:
+cc @kchodorow

@AnishShah IIRC the problem with using the git_* rules behind a proxy has been fixed in the most recent versions of Bazel. Which version are you using?

@nitnelave It seems that your build was able to successfully clone a bunch of the other repositories and this particular failure seems to be caused by spurious errors when cloning a repository. AFAIK, the git_repository rules currently do not support retrying failures.
